text: (am) vanankalin pataikalai ataintu musavutaiya antavanai nan kana ventum; eninum avar poy collukirar enre niccayamaka nan ennukiren;" ena hpir'avn kurinan. Ivvare hpir'avnukku avanutaiya tiya ceyalkal alakakkappattana innum (ner) valiyiliruntu avan tatukkappattan; hpir'avnutaiya cati alivillamal (veru evvitamakavum) mutiya villai
